name: Morgana Classic ⟡♡✧ (LoRA)
description:
Hii ໒꒰´ ˘ ` ꒱づ♡ Highly requested Morgana Classic !! I hope you enjoy ! I do have to say I had a lot of issues so if you guys would like to me to update in the future let me know !! <3

- Also would you guys use a model mix I make ? I wanted to make a model mix that would work extremely well with every anime type LoRA I make !! Idk if that's a waste but I've been working on a model mix and was just wondering. let me know (ෆ˙ᵕ˙ෆ)♡ !!

((This Lora does work for photorealistic models its actually better then with anime models tbh hehe))

Requested by @elge and @themangamer123 and a few other people !! Thank you so much for the request !! I really appreciate it ( ˘͈ ᵕ ˘͈♡)

This Lora works with almost every anime model and semi realistic models !! so go wild with it !! ^^

The Lora also works really well with NSFW Prompts !! so have fun with that ! I have a few examples of that as well !! This is not a only NSFW Lora though ૮₍ ˃ ⤙ ˂ ₎ა !!

Please use negative prompt Embedding bad-image-v2-39000 it works alot better then without it !!

Please use Trigger words Nude, (nipples), large_breast, if your having issues with getting good NSFW generations (specifically with her breast not having nipples) <3

Also use trigger words large_breast, eye_makeup, purple_wings if your having trouble getting all her features !

I recommend keeping the weight at (1-0.98) and using the negative prompts as needed !!

I had so much fun making the Lora and generating the images I hope you have as much fun as I did ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝♡ !!!

Please be kind with this Lora ♡

modelVersions.name: MorganaV1
modelVersions.description:
I highly recommend using the trigger word Morgana_Default.

I also highly recommend keeping the weight between (0.90-1) and using negative prompts where needed !

BTW if your having issues with the images looking messy lower the denoising strength when using Hires,Fix !! <3

Here are all the settings used for most the examples:

Denoising strength: 0.6

Clip skip: 2

Hires upscale: 1.8

Hires upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B

Discard penultimate sigma: True

meta.prompt:
best quality, masterpiece, extremely detailed, Morgana_Default, large_breast, eye_makeup, purple_wings, ((night sky background))

 <lora:Morgana-05:1>
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), bad hands, bad-image-v2-39000, blank background
